description: This file provides helper utilities for JSON Web Token (JWT) creation and decoding, centralizing JWT handling based on application settings. It includes functions to create signed access tokens and decode/validate tokens, used for authentication purposes.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str, extra_claims: Dict[str, Any] | None = None)
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT access token with optional extra claims, embedding subject, issue time, and expiration time.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] decode_token(token: str)
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT string, returning the payload or raising an error if invalid or expired.

ctags.name: create_access_token
ctags.pattern: /^def create_access_token(subject: str, extra_claims: Dict[str, Any] | None = None) -> str:$/
ctags.signature: (subject: str, extra_claims: Dict[str, Any] | None = None)
